refined_prompts.original_description: John Cena and Brock Lesnar facing each other in the ring
refined_prompts.enhanced_prompt: Cinematic shot of two muscular professional wrestlers in an intense face-off, standing 3 feet apart in a brightly lit wrestling ring. Dynamic lighting with dramatic shadows casting across their determined faces. Low-angle camera perspective creating heroic framing. Background features a massive LED screen with pulsing red and blue graphics. Smoke effects drift across the canvas floor. Hyperrealistic 8K quality, dramatic depth of field focusing on the wrestlers' expressions. Camera slowly circles the subjects at eye level.
alternative_prompts: Close-up tracking shot alternating between two professional wrestlers' intense faces, dramatic rim lighting, atmosphere filled with particle effects, inside a grand arena setting. Camera smoothly pushes in, ultra HD quality.

Wide establishing shot of wrestling ring from elevated angle, two imposing figures in dramatic standoff, arena lights creating dramatic beams, crowd silhouettes visible in background, slow motion effect.

refined_prompts.original_description: Quick cuts of powerful moves and reactions
refined_prompts.enhanced_prompt: High-energy sequence of professional wrestling action shots, rapid cuts between dynamic moves. Includes power slam in slow motion with camera shake effect, crowd reaction shots showing intense excitement, explosive particle effects during impact moments. Sharp contrast lighting emphasizing muscular definition. Camera switches between low angle and overhead perspectives. Cinematic color grading with enhanced saturation.
alternative_prompts: Slow-motion sequence of wrestling moves, camera following the action with fluid movement, dramatic lighting casting dynamic shadows, visible impact ripples, crowd in background creating depth.
Fast-paced montage of wrestling highlights, quick cuts between moves, camera positioned at mat level, dramatic speed ramping effects, lens flares during intense moments.

model_specific_tips: Use --style cinematic --quality premium flags for Hailuo
Enable motion interpolation for smooth slow-motion in Runway
Adjust seed values if initial generations lack detail

claude_refinement.claude_analysis: The refined prompts emphasize hyperrealistic detail and dynamic camera movement to create maximum impact. Scene 1 focuses on building tension through careful composition and lighting, while Scene 2 delivers high-energy action through technical effects and varied perspectives. The prompts are structured to maintain visual consistency while maximizing engagement through careful pacing and dramatic elements.
improvement_suggestions: Added specific camera movement instructions for better spatial clarity
Enhanced lighting descriptions for more dramatic contrast
Included technical parameters for optimal render quality
Incorporated crowd elements to increase sense of scale
Added particle effects and impact moments for enhanced drama
